text: The 1973 Czechoslovak Figure Skating Championships was held on January 13–14, 1973 in Liptovsky Mikulas. Medals were awarded in the disciplines of men's singles, ladies' singles, pair skating, and ice dancing. ==Results== ===Men=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Rank !
